name: **Crovinish**
description: Crovinish L923-865 Sheet 30/31 Absentee farmed, but with the farmhouse still well there at the E end. Very nice to walk, it enjoys mains water and electricity. Nice views all round. Pleasant. Sheep. There is also a sometimes little beach at just E of NW tip. Otter. 30 Red-breasted Merganser December 2008.
